ingredients: 500g boneless, skinless chicken thighs, cut into bite-sized pieces
instructions: In a bowl, marinate chicken with yogurt, garam masala, turmeric, cumin, chili powder, and ginger-garlic paste. Refrigerate for at least 2 hours.
In a pan, melt butter and add marinated chicken. Cook until browned.
Stir in tomato puree and simmer for 15 minutes.
Pour in heavy cream, season with salt and pepper, and cook for an additional 10 minutes.
Garnish with fresh coriander leaves. Serve hot with naan or rice. Enjoy your Butter Chicken!
Heat oil in a pan and sauté chopped onions until golden brown.
Add ginger-garlic paste and sauté for 2 minutes.
Add chopped tomatoes, red chili powder, ground coriander, ground cumin, turmeric powder, and salt. Cook until the oil separates.
Add chicken pieces and cook until they are well-coated with the spice mixture.
Add water, cover, and simmer until the chicken is cooked through.
Garnish with fresh coriander leaves. Serve hot with rice or flatbread. Enjoy your Chicken Bhuna!
Preheat your oven to the highest temperature (usually around 475°F or 245°C).
Roll out the pizza dough on a floured surface to your desired thickness.
Spread pizza sauce evenly over the dough, leaving a small border around the edges.
Place slices of fresh mozzarella on top of the sauce.
Drizzle with extra-virgin olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
Bake in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes or until the crust is golden and the cheese is bubbly.
Remove from the oven, sprinkle fresh basil leaves on top, and slice. Enjoy your Margherita Pizza!
Divide the ground beef into 4 equal portions and shape them into patties. Season with salt and pepper.
Preheat your grill or stovetop pan over medium-high heat.
Grill the burger patties for 3-4 minutes per side or until they reach your desired doneness.
During the last minute of cooking, place a slice of cheddar cheese on each patty and cover to melt.
Toast the hamburger buns on the grill or in a toaster.
Assemble the burgers with lettuce, tomato, onion, and your favorite condiments.
Serve hot. Enjoy your Classic Cheeseburger!
